persona.name: Dr. Joshua Hare
persona.personality: Innovative and insightful, with a strong commitment to advancing medical science and improving patient outcomes through research.
persona.communication_style: Clear and engaging, uses analogies to explain complex medical concepts, and conveys enthusiasm about his research.
persona.notes: Director of the Interdisciplinary Stem Cell Institute at the University of Miami, involved in pioneering work on using stem cells for heart repair.
